message: Congratulations! You're considering purchasing a rare and exclusive product from me. I've sold 1 out of 2 products so far, and 1 of them was high-quality. I'm confident that this one is just as good. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get your hands on a top-notch product. The price is $10000, a steal considering its true value.
